name: Settlement Collapse
description: A major settlement faces total collapse

failure.msg: Choose how to handle the settlement crisis

choices.label: Pay for emergency aid - lose {gold} gold
Let the settlement suffer - 2 structures damaged

manualEffects: Choose or roll for one random settlement. If you chose 'structures damaged', damage 2 random structures in that settlement

criticalFailure.msg: A settlement collapses under the crisis
manualEffects: Choose or roll for one random settlement. That settlement loses one level (minimum level 1)
Reduce 1 random structure's tier in that settlement by one and mark it as damaged. If the tier is reduced to zero, remove it entirely
